column1: This Streamlit dashboard presents a visual analysis of the Indian Electric Vehicle (EV) market from 2001 to 2024.
- `indian_ev_market_2001_2024.csv`: Cleaned dataset used in the dashboard
- EV sales by vehicle type (2W, 3W, 4W, Bus)
- Total EV sales trends over years
Simulated based on reports by NITI Aayog, SIAM, and government policy documents.
